import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import './Dashboard.css'; import { ReactComponent as CheckIcon } from '../assets/check-icon.svg'; import { ReactComponent as ClockIcon } from '../assets/clock-icon.svg'; import { ReactComponent as WarningIcon } from '../assets/warning-icon.svg'; import RiskChart from './RiskChart'; function Dashboard() { const { currentUser } = useAuth(); // Sample data for dashboard const stats = { totalProducts: 156, pendingEvaluations: 12, completedEvaluations: 48, activeUsers: 8 }; // Sample recent evaluations const recentEvaluations = [ { id: 1, product: 'Yogurt Natural', date: '2024-04-05', status: 'Aprobado', score: 92 }, { id: 2, product: 'Pan Integral', date: '2024-04-04', status: 'Aprobado', score: 88 }, { id: 3, product: 'Jugo de Naranja', date: '2024-04-03', status: 'Pendiente', score: null }, { id: 4, product: 'Queso Fresco', date: '2024-04-02', status: 'Rechazado', score: 65 } ]; return (

); } export default Dashboard;
